title: Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
markings: Publishers monogram embossed, lower left corner:  FM [Franca Manchini]
signed: Signed in gray on plate, lower right:  BALLA/FUTURISTA
description: Large detail of central section of plate 1, "Fuochi d'Artificio (Bozetto)"  showing, at left, tall building with pyramidal top, prism-shaped building in purple with swirls in pastel colors above, in center right, overlapping geometric shapes in red and orange, lower center, and green form, perhaps representing plants, lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original.
ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-8.
